title: Check SOW Against Budget
description: An agent must verify that the work described in a Statement of Work (SOW) can be completed within the allocated project budget.

tasks.description: Estimate the total effort (in days) required for the tasks listed in the SOW.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a reasonable total effort estimate.

tasks.description: Calculate the total estimated cost based on the effort and standard day rates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the total estimated project cost.

tasks.description: Compare the estimated cost against the project budget and flag any discrepancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reports that the estimated cost is 10% over the allocated budget.
